org.gvsig.raster.impl.store.properties

Class MultiProviderStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.impl.store.properties.AbstractStatistics
      • org.gvsig.raster.impl.store.properties.MultiProviderStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Statistics

    public class MultiProviderStatistics
extends AbstractStatistics
    Estadisticas asociadas a un fichero raster formado por multiples ficheros.
